DATASOURCE.NAME: TERMDATA
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE SYSTEM_TERMDATA ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SYSTEM_TERMDATA PRIMARY KEY (STD_TERMID)
ALTER TABLE SYSTEM_TERMTREE ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SYSTEM_TERMTREE PRIMARY KEY (STT_CHILD_TERMID, STT_PARENT_TERMID)
ALTER TABLE SYSTEM_TERMTREE ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SYSTEM_TERMTREE FOREIGN KEY (STT_CHILD_TERMID) REFERENCES SYSTEM_TERMDATA(STD_TERMID)

DATASOURCE.NAME: ENTREZGENE
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_UNIGENE ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_UNIGENE FOREIGN KEY (EUG_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_MAP ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_MAP FOREIGN KEY (EMA_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_STS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_STS FOREIGN KEY (EST_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_GOID ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_GOID FOREIGN KEY (EGO_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_OMIM ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_OMIM FOREIGN KEY (EOM_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_PMIDS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_PMIDS FOREIGN KEY (EPI_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_GENENAMES ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_GENENAMES FOREIGN KEY (EGE_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_FLY ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_FLY FOREIGN KEY (EFY_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE FOREIGN KEY (EPH_GENEID) REFERENCES ENTREZGENE(EGE_GENEID)

DATASOURCE.NAME: UNIGENE
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE UG_EXPRESS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UG_EXPRESS FOREIGN KEY (UEX_UGID) REFERENCES UNIGENE(UGE_UGID)
ALTER TABLE UG_SEQUENCE ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UG_SEQUENCE FOREIGN KEY (USE_UGID) REFERENCES UNIGENE(UGE_UGID)
ALTER TABLE UG_PROTSIM ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UG_PROTSIM FOREIGN KEY (UPR_UGID) REFERENCES UNIGENE(UGE_UGID)

DATASOURCE.NAME: UNISTS
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE UNISTS_ACCESSION ADD CONSTRAINT FK_UNISTS_ACCESSION FOREIGN KEY (UST_STSID,UST_LOCAL_TAXID) REFERENCES UNISTS(UST_STSID,UST_LOCAL_TAXID)

DATASOURCE.NAME: SERVER_STATUS
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE SERVER_FILE_STATUS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SERVER_FILE_STATUS FOREIGN KEY (SFS_ID) REFERENCES SERVER_STATUS (SST_ID)

DATASOURCE.NAME: DBSNP
DATASOURCE.CONSTRAINT_QUERY: ALTER TABLE CONTIG_INFO ADD CONSTRAINT FK_CONTIG_INFO FOREIGN KEY (CTI_SNPID) REFERENCES SNPTABLE(SNP_SNPID)
ALTER TABLE ENTREZ_SNP ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ENTREZ_SNP FOREIGN KEY (ESN_SNPID) REFERENCES SNPTABLE(SNP_SNPID)
ALTER TABLE CONTIG_MAPLOC ADD CONSTRAINT FK_CONTIG_MAPLOC_SNPID FOREIGN KEY (CML_SNPID) REFERENCES SNPTABLE(SNP_SNPID)
ALTER TABLE FXNSET_CONTIGMAP ADD CONSTRAINT FK_FXNSET_CONTIGMAP_SNPID FOREIGN KEY (FCM_SNPID) REFERENCES SNPTABLE(SNP_SNPID)
